thread.title: Readers get up close with Today Show hosts
thread.title_full: Readers get up close with Today Show hosts

title: Readers get up close with Today Show hosts
text:
Readers get up close with Today Show hosts 1st Oct 2015 12:17 PM Updated: 12:26 PM Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
HUNDREDS of Sunshine Coasters went down to Moffat Beach in Caloundra today to catch a glimpse of Karl Stefanovic, Lisa Wilkinson and Richard Wilkins at The Today Show live broadcast. 
Some residents were lucky enough to snap a selfie with the hosts, while others won some money. 
Erika Harris was one who snapped a selfie with Karl. 

Jade Mackay shared her selfie with Richard Wilkins. 
Sarah Casement also got a photo with Karl. 
The luckiest family though would have to go to the Palazzi's. 
Young Rex won $200 for the family through Dickie's Double Dip and managed to get a selfie with Karl. â€” Tasman Palazzi (@TheRealTasman) October 1, 2015 selfies
